description_html:
Construction: Handmade using bamboo silk engineered specfically for Tufenkian Carpets.

Design story: Canvas Denim was inspired by the craftsmanship involved in creating something as seemingly simple as a pair of blue jeans. Japanese denim is the most painstakingly crafted denim in the world, using natural dyes and specialized weaving processes that requires highly skilled weavers to produce.
James immediately saw the parallels between the creation of Japanese denim and the production of Tibetan carpets, and created a design to pay homage to the decades of knowledge and craftsmanship that built the Japanese denim industry. The deep indigo and bright white mimics the construction of denim, a process which leaves the weft threads undyed and gives each piece a unique pattern.
